body:
I think a REPL would be a useful feature, but it would be difficult to expose the actual Shield implementation to the site's frontend. We talked about doing this in the past for the preview feature, and couldn't figure out a safe way to do it, and so backed off. I've been pondering if we could get away with some sort of extension to do this, but I haven't come up with anything solid yet.

It would be pretty simple to make a REPL that executed filter expressions in the webpage, but it wouldn't include the extra details added by the recipe client, such as Firefox version or Telemetry  pings.
